text: Grace!
Come inside the house; it's time for bed.

3.name: Grace
text: But Mozes, I'm not sleepy yet. I don't wanna!

4.name: Mozes
text: I understand, but it's getting dark soon. You need to come inside.

5.name: Grace
text: Aw, man! Mommy and daddy always let me stay outside after dark!

6.name: Mozes
text: Heh, that's not entirely true. But come now, you must listen to me.

8.name: Grace
text: Alright...

1.name: Mozes
text: I'm sorry, Grace, but after our parents were killed, you know it's not safe here in the village after dark. Orcs sometimes enter the village, and I don't want to lose you too.

2.name: Grace
text: Boohoo! I miss mommy and daddy!

3.name: Mozes
text: Me too, Grace, me too.

4.name: Mozes
text: Anyway, it's not just getting dark; it's also past your bedtime. So, goodnight and sweet dreams.

5.name: Grace
text: But I really wanna play outside! I'm not afraid of the dark.

6.name: Mozes
text: Tomorrow, when it's safe, you can play outside again.

7.name: Grace
text: But...

8.name: Mozes
text: No more 'buts'. It's time to sleep now.

9.name: Mozes
text: I love you. Sleep tight.

10.name: Grace
text: Love you too.
Good morning, Grace. Did you sleep well?
Grace?
Grace, where are you?
Is she gone? She knows better than to leave without telling me.
I hope she didn't run off again. It's still dangerous outside the village.
Oh no! I need to make sure.
I'll get my weapons, just in case.

1.name: Mozes
text: Mrs. Johanna! Have you seen Grace?

2.name: Mrs. Johanna
text: I'm sorry, dear. I haven't seen Grace this morning. Is everything alright?

3.name: Mozes
text: I don't know where she is. She wasn't in her bed this morning.

4.name: Mrs. Johanna
text: Perhaps she went north? She likes to go there.

5.name: Mozes
text: I'm afraid she did. There are orcs in the forest.

6.name: Mrs. Johanna
text: I'll ask around in the village to see if anyone else saw her.

7.name: Mozes
text: Please do. I'll head north.
What was that loud noise?
Dang! That's just great.
Umph! I can't move it out of the way. Now I can't return.
Well, there's nothing I can do about it now.
My fellow villagers will probably remove it soon.
But first, I need to find Grace.
